emuInput.TitMainTitle: Two men, including Attorney Henry R. Smith on right, and two girls, one holding box inscribed "Holiday Greetings Brach's Chocolates," gathered behind table with box of food from Frontiers Club, in domestic kitchen
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 1, 1955, page 20 reads: "Plays Santa Claus - Atty. Henry R. Smith, Frontiersman, delivers one of the fifty baskets distributed by Frontiers Club before Christmas. Attorney Smith carried food to this family on the South Side. Other Frontiersmen delivered baskets to all sections of the city. - Harris Photo"
